nodes.bodyText:
Fix execution failure for queries involving large ``IN`` predicates on long decimal values.

I'm not sure if there's a better way to say "long decimal".

nodes.bodyText:
* Support configuring multiple event listeners. The properties files for all the event listeners
  can be specified using the ``event-listener.config-files`` configuration property. (:issue:`3128`)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,84 @@
+=========================
+Release 332 (XX Apr 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix LDAP authentication not working if user belongs to multiple groups. (:issue:`3206`)
+* Fix query failure during planing phase for certain queries involving multiple joins. (:issue:`3149`)
+* Fix execution failure for queries involving huge IN on long decimal columns. (:issue:`3191`)
+* Ignore trailing whitespace when loading configuration files such as ``etc/event-listener.properties``,
+  ``etc/group-provider.properties``, etc. Trailing whitespace in main and catalog configuration files was
+  already ignored. (:issue:`3231`)
+* Include filters over all table columns in output of ``EXPLAIN (TYPE IO)``. (:issue:`2743`)
+* Support multiple event listener plugins. They can be specified with ``event-listener.config-files`` configuration property. (:issue:`3128`)

nodes.bodyText:
* Add ``optimizer.push-partial-aggregation-through-join`` configuration property to control
  pushing partial aggregations through inner joins. Previously, this was only available
  via the ``push_partial_aggregation_through_join`` session property. (:issue:`3205`)

+* Add ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` syntax to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add ``optimizer.push-partial-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle for pushing partial

@@ -0,0 +1,84 @@
+=========================
+Release 332 (XX Apr 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix LDAP authentication not working if user belongs to multiple groups. (:issue:`3206`)
+* Fix query failure during planing phase for certain queries involving multiple joins. (:issue:`3149`)
+* Fix execution failure for queries involving huge IN on long decimal columns. (:issue:`3191`)
+* Ignore trailing whitespace when loading configuration files such as ``etc/event-listener.properties``,
+  ``etc/group-provider.properties``, etc. Trailing whitespace in main and catalog configuration files was
+  already ignored. (:issue:`3231`)
+* Include filters over all table columns in output of ``EXPLAIN (TYPE IO)``. (:issue:`2743`)
+* Support multiple event listener plugins. They can be specified with ``event-listener.config-files`` configuration property. (:issue:`3128`)
+* Add ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` syntax to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add ``optimizer.push-partial-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle for pushing partial
+  aggregation through inner join. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Rename ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle to
+  ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-outer-join``. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Expose operator stats of how many splits were processed with dynamic filter applied. (:issue:`3217`)

nodes.bodyText: * Only return views accessible to the user from ``information_schema.views``. (:issue:`3290`)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,84 @@
+=========================
+Release 332 (XX Apr 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix LDAP authentication not working if user belongs to multiple groups. (:issue:`3206`)
+* Fix query failure during planing phase for certain queries involving multiple joins. (:issue:`3149`)
+* Fix execution failure for queries involving huge IN on long decimal columns. (:issue:`3191`)
+* Ignore trailing whitespace when loading configuration files such as ``etc/event-listener.properties``,
+  ``etc/group-provider.properties``, etc. Trailing whitespace in main and catalog configuration files was
+  already ignored. (:issue:`3231`)
+* Include filters over all table columns in output of ``EXPLAIN (TYPE IO)``. (:issue:`2743`)
+* Support multiple event listener plugins. They can be specified with ``event-listener.config-files`` configuration property. (:issue:`3128`)
+* Add ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` syntax to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add ``optimizer.push-partial-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle for pushing partial
+  aggregation through inner join. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Rename ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle to
+  ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-outer-join``. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Expose operator stats of how many splits were processed with dynamic filter applied. (:issue:`3217`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Verify access to table columns when running ``SHOW STATS``. (:issue:`2665`)
+* Return only accessible to user views from ``<catalog>.information_schema.views`` table. (:issue:`3290`)

nodes.bodyText:
* Allow specifying the Glue metastore endpoint URL using the
  ``hive.metastore.glue.endpoint-url`` configuration property. (:issue:`3239`)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,84 @@
+=========================
+Release 332 (XX Apr 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix LDAP authentication not working if user belongs to multiple groups. (:issue:`3206`)
+* Fix query failure during planing phase for certain queries involving multiple joins. (:issue:`3149`)
+* Fix execution failure for queries involving huge IN on long decimal columns. (:issue:`3191`)
+* Ignore trailing whitespace when loading configuration files such as ``etc/event-listener.properties``,
+  ``etc/group-provider.properties``, etc. Trailing whitespace in main and catalog configuration files was
+  already ignored. (:issue:`3231`)
+* Include filters over all table columns in output of ``EXPLAIN (TYPE IO)``. (:issue:`2743`)
+* Support multiple event listener plugins. They can be specified with ``event-listener.config-files`` configuration property. (:issue:`3128`)
+* Add ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` syntax to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add ``optimizer.push-partial-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle for pushing partial
+  aggregation through inner join. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Rename ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle to
+  ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-outer-join``. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Expose operator stats of how many splits were processed with dynamic filter applied. (:issue:`3217`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Verify access to table columns when running ``SHOW STATS``. (:issue:`2665`)
+* Return only accessible to user views from ``<catalog>.information_schema.views`` table. (:issue:`3290`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix failure reading certain Parquet files larger than 2GB. (:issue:`2730`)
+* Improve performance when reading gzip-compressed Parquet data. (:issue:`3175`)
+* Add ``hive.fs.new-directory-permissions`` configuration property for setting the permissions of new directories
+  created by Presto. Default value is ``0777``. (:issue:`3126`)
+* Add ``hive.partition-use-column-names`` configuration property and matching ``partition_use_column_names`` catalog
+  session property that allows to match columns between table and partition schemas by names. By default they are mapped
+  by index. (:issue:2933`)
+* Add support for ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add support for endpoint URL for Glue. (:issue:`3239`)

nodes.bodyText: * Add experimental file system caching. This can be enabled with the ``hive.cache.enabled`` configuration property. (:issue:`2679`)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,84 @@
+=========================
+Release 332 (XX Apr 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix LDAP authentication not working if user belongs to multiple groups. (:issue:`3206`)
+* Fix query failure during planing phase for certain queries involving multiple joins. (:issue:`3149`)
+* Fix execution failure for queries involving huge IN on long decimal columns. (:issue:`3191`)
+* Ignore trailing whitespace when loading configuration files such as ``etc/event-listener.properties``,
+  ``etc/group-provider.properties``, etc. Trailing whitespace in main and catalog configuration files was
+  already ignored. (:issue:`3231`)
+* Include filters over all table columns in output of ``EXPLAIN (TYPE IO)``. (:issue:`2743`)
+* Support multiple event listener plugins. They can be specified with ``event-listener.config-files`` configuration property. (:issue:`3128`)
+* Add ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` syntax to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add ``optimizer.push-partial-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle for pushing partial
+  aggregation through inner join. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Rename ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle to
+  ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-outer-join``. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Expose operator stats of how many splits were processed with dynamic filter applied. (:issue:`3217`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Verify access to table columns when running ``SHOW STATS``. (:issue:`2665`)
+* Return only accessible to user views from ``<catalog>.information_schema.views`` table. (:issue:`3290`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix failure reading certain Parquet files larger than 2GB. (:issue:`2730`)
+* Improve performance when reading gzip-compressed Parquet data. (:issue:`3175`)
+* Add ``hive.fs.new-directory-permissions`` configuration property for setting the permissions of new directories
+  created by Presto. Default value is ``0777``. (:issue:`3126`)
+* Add ``hive.partition-use-column-names`` configuration property and matching ``partition_use_column_names`` catalog
+  session property that allows to match columns between table and partition schemas by names. By default they are mapped
+  by index. (:issue:2933`)
+* Add support for ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add support for endpoint URL for Glue. (:issue:`3239`)
+* Add experimental file system caching. This can be enabled with the ``hive.cache.enabled`` catalog property. (:issue:`2679`)

nodes.bodyText: * Add :func:`objectid_timestamp` for extracting the timestamp from ``ObjectId``. (:issue:`3089`)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,84 @@
+=========================
+Release 332 (XX Apr 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix LDAP authentication not working if user belongs to multiple groups. (:issue:`3206`)
+* Fix query failure during planing phase for certain queries involving multiple joins. (:issue:`3149`)
+* Fix execution failure for queries involving huge IN on long decimal columns. (:issue:`3191`)
+* Ignore trailing whitespace when loading configuration files such as ``etc/event-listener.properties``,
+  ``etc/group-provider.properties``, etc. Trailing whitespace in main and catalog configuration files was
+  already ignored. (:issue:`3231`)
+* Include filters over all table columns in output of ``EXPLAIN (TYPE IO)``. (:issue:`2743`)
+* Support multiple event listener plugins. They can be specified with ``event-listener.config-files`` configuration property. (:issue:`3128`)
+* Add ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` syntax to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add ``optimizer.push-partial-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle for pushing partial
+  aggregation through inner join. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Rename ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle to
+  ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-outer-join``. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Expose operator stats of how many splits were processed with dynamic filter applied. (:issue:`3217`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Verify access to table columns when running ``SHOW STATS``. (:issue:`2665`)
+* Return only accessible to user views from ``<catalog>.information_schema.views`` table. (:issue:`3290`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix failure reading certain Parquet files larger than 2GB. (:issue:`2730`)
+* Improve performance when reading gzip-compressed Parquet data. (:issue:`3175`)
+* Add ``hive.fs.new-directory-permissions`` configuration property for setting the permissions of new directories
+  created by Presto. Default value is ``0777``. (:issue:`3126`)
+* Add ``hive.partition-use-column-names`` configuration property and matching ``partition_use_column_names`` catalog
+  session property that allows to match columns between table and partition schemas by names. By default they are mapped
+  by index. (:issue:2933`)
+* Add support for ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add support for endpoint URL for Glue. (:issue:`3239`)
+* Add experimental file system caching. This can be enabled with the ``hive.cache.enabled`` catalog property. (:issue:`2679`)
+
+BigQuery Connector Changes
+--------------------------
+
+* Extract parent project ID from service account before looking at the environment. (:issue:`3131`)
+
+MongoDB Connector Changes
+-------------------------
+
+* Add ``objectid_timestamp`` function for getting ``timestamp with time zone`` from ``ObjectId``. (:issue:`3089`)

nodes.bodyText:
* Delete document from ``_schema`` collection when ``DROP TABLE``
  is executed for a table that exists only in ``_schema``. (:issue:`3234`)

@@ -0,0 +1,84 @@
+=========================
+Release 332 (XX Apr 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix LDAP authentication not working if user belongs to multiple groups. (:issue:`3206`)
+* Fix query failure during planing phase for certain queries involving multiple joins. (:issue:`3149`)
+* Fix execution failure for queries involving huge IN on long decimal columns. (:issue:`3191`)
+* Ignore trailing whitespace when loading configuration files such as ``etc/event-listener.properties``,
+  ``etc/group-provider.properties``, etc. Trailing whitespace in main and catalog configuration files was
+  already ignored. (:issue:`3231`)
+* Include filters over all table columns in output of ``EXPLAIN (TYPE IO)``. (:issue:`2743`)
+* Support multiple event listener plugins. They can be specified with ``event-listener.config-files`` configuration property. (:issue:`3128`)
+* Add ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` syntax to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add ``optimizer.push-partial-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle for pushing partial
+  aggregation through inner join. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Rename ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle to
+  ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-outer-join``. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Expose operator stats of how many splits were processed with dynamic filter applied. (:issue:`3217`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Verify access to table columns when running ``SHOW STATS``. (:issue:`2665`)
+* Return only accessible to user views from ``<catalog>.information_schema.views`` table. (:issue:`3290`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix failure reading certain Parquet files larger than 2GB. (:issue:`2730`)
+* Improve performance when reading gzip-compressed Parquet data. (:issue:`3175`)
+* Add ``hive.fs.new-directory-permissions`` configuration property for setting the permissions of new directories
+  created by Presto. Default value is ``0777``. (:issue:`3126`)
+* Add ``hive.partition-use-column-names`` configuration property and matching ``partition_use_column_names`` catalog
+  session property that allows to match columns between table and partition schemas by names. By default they are mapped
+  by index. (:issue:2933`)
+* Add support for ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add support for endpoint URL for Glue. (:issue:`3239`)
+* Add experimental file system caching. This can be enabled with the ``hive.cache.enabled`` catalog property. (:issue:`2679`)
+
+BigQuery Connector Changes
+--------------------------
+
+* Extract parent project ID from service account before looking at the environment. (:issue:`3131`)
+
+MongoDB Connector Changes
+-------------------------
+
+* Add ``objectid_timestamp`` function for getting ``timestamp with time zone`` from ``ObjectId``. (:issue:`3089`)
+* Delete document from ``_schema`` collection when DROP TABLE is executed for the table that exists only in ``_schema``. (:issue:`3234`)

+General Changes
+---------------

+* Include filters over all table columns in output of ``EXPLAIN (TYPE IO)``. (:issue:`2743`)
+* Support multiple event listener plugins. They can be specified with ``event-listener.config-files`` configuration property. (:issue:`3128`)
+* Add ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` syntax to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add ``optimizer.push-partial-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle for pushing partial
+  aggregation through inner join. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Rename ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle to
+  ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-outer-join``. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Expose operator stats of how many splits were processed with dynamic filter applied. (:issue:`3217`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Verify access to table columns when running ``SHOW STATS``. (:issue:`2665`)
+* Return only accessible to user views from ``<catalog>.information_schema.views`` table. (:issue:`3290`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix failure reading certain Parquet files larger than 2GB. (:issue:`2730`)
+* Improve performance when reading gzip-compressed Parquet data. (:issue:`3175`)
+* Add ``hive.fs.new-directory-permissions`` configuration property for setting the permissions of new directories
+  created by Presto. Default value is ``0777``. (:issue:`3126`)
+* Add ``hive.partition-use-column-names`` configuration property and matching ``partition_use_column_names`` catalog
+  session property that allows to match columns between table and partition schemas by names. By default they are mapped
+  by index. (:issue:2933`)
+* Add support for ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add support for endpoint URL for Glue. (:issue:`3239`)
+* Add experimental file system caching. This can be enabled with the ``hive.cache.enabled`` catalog property. (:issue:`2679`)
+
+BigQuery Connector Changes
+--------------------------

+* Extract parent project ID from service account before looking at the environment. (:issue:`3131`)
+
+MongoDB Connector Changes
+-------------------------
+
+* Add ``objectid_timestamp`` function for getting ``timestamp with time zone`` from ``ObjectId``. (:issue:`3089`)
+* Delete document from ``_schema`` collection when DROP TABLE is executed for the table that exists only in ``_schema``. (:issue:`3234`)
+
+Kudu Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix incorrect column mapping in Kudu connector (:issue:`3170`, :issue:`2963`)

+Release 332 (XX Apr 2020)

+General Changes
+---------------

+* Fix query failure during planing phase for certain queries involving multiple joins. (:issue:`3149`)
+* Fix execution failure for queries involving huge IN on long decimal columns. (:issue:`3191`)

+* Add ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` syntax to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).

+  aggregation through inner join. (:issue:`3205`)

+----------------------
+
+* Fix incorrect column mapping in Kudu connector (:issue:`3170`, :issue:`2963`)
+* Fix incorrect query result for certain queries involving ``IS NULL`` predicates with ``OR``. (:issue:`3274`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Add support for ``ip`` type. (:issue:`3347`)
+* Add support for `keyword` fields with numeric values. (:issue:`3381`)
+
+Memory Connector Changes
+------------------------
+
+* List missing views in ``system.jdbc.tables`` table. (:issue:`3208`)

nodes.bodyText:
* Disallow renaming tables between schemas. Previously, such renames were allowed
  but the schema name was ignored when performing the rename. (:issue:`3284`)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,84 @@
+=========================
+Release 332 (XX Apr 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix LDAP authentication not working if user belongs to multiple groups. (:issue:`3206`)
+* Fix query failure during planing phase for certain queries involving multiple joins. (:issue:`3149`)
+* Fix execution failure for queries involving huge IN on long decimal columns. (:issue:`3191`)
+* Ignore trailing whitespace when loading configuration files such as ``etc/event-listener.properties``,
+  ``etc/group-provider.properties``, etc. Trailing whitespace in main and catalog configuration files was
+  already ignored. (:issue:`3231`)
+* Include filters over all table columns in output of ``EXPLAIN (TYPE IO)``. (:issue:`2743`)
+* Support multiple event listener plugins. They can be specified with ``event-listener.config-files`` configuration property. (:issue:`3128`)
+* Add ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` syntax to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add ``optimizer.push-partial-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle for pushing partial
+  aggregation through inner join. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Rename ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle to
+  ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-outer-join``. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Expose operator stats of how many splits were processed with dynamic filter applied. (:issue:`3217`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Verify access to table columns when running ``SHOW STATS``. (:issue:`2665`)
+* Return only accessible to user views from ``<catalog>.information_schema.views`` table. (:issue:`3290`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix failure reading certain Parquet files larger than 2GB. (:issue:`2730`)
+* Improve performance when reading gzip-compressed Parquet data. (:issue:`3175`)
+* Add ``hive.fs.new-directory-permissions`` configuration property for setting the permissions of new directories
+  created by Presto. Default value is ``0777``. (:issue:`3126`)
+* Add ``hive.partition-use-column-names`` configuration property and matching ``partition_use_column_names`` catalog
+  session property that allows to match columns between table and partition schemas by names. By default they are mapped
+  by index. (:issue:2933`)
+* Add support for ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add support for endpoint URL for Glue. (:issue:`3239`)
+* Add experimental file system caching. This can be enabled with the ``hive.cache.enabled`` catalog property. (:issue:`2679`)
+
+BigQuery Connector Changes
+--------------------------
+
+* Extract parent project ID from service account before looking at the environment. (:issue:`3131`)
+
+MongoDB Connector Changes
+-------------------------
+
+* Add ``objectid_timestamp`` function for getting ``timestamp with time zone`` from ``ObjectId``. (:issue:`3089`)
+* Delete document from ``_schema`` collection when DROP TABLE is executed for the table that exists only in ``_schema``. (:issue:`3234`)
+
+Kudu Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix incorrect column mapping in Kudu connector (:issue:`3170`, :issue:`2963`)
+* Fix incorrect query result for certain queries involving ``IS NULL`` predicates with ``OR``. (:issue:`3274`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Add support for ``ip`` type. (:issue:`3347`)
+* Add support for `keyword` fields with numeric values. (:issue:`3381`)
+
+Memory Connector Changes
+------------------------
+
+* List missing views in ``system.jdbc.tables`` table. (:issue:`3208`)
+
+SQL Server Connector
+--------------------
+
+* Reject ``ALTER TABLE ... RENAME TO`` between schemas. Previously such rename was accepted but

nodes.bodyText: * Allow ``Connector`` to provide ``EventListener`` instances. (:issue:`3166`)

+=========================
+Release 332 (XX Apr 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix LDAP authentication not working if user belongs to multiple groups. (:issue:`3206`)
+* Fix query failure during planing phase for certain queries involving multiple joins. (:issue:`3149`)
+* Fix execution failure for queries involving huge IN on long decimal columns. (:issue:`3191`)
+* Ignore trailing whitespace when loading configuration files such as ``etc/event-listener.properties``,
+  ``etc/group-provider.properties``, etc. Trailing whitespace in main and catalog configuration files was
+  already ignored. (:issue:`3231`)
+* Include filters over all table columns in output of ``EXPLAIN (TYPE IO)``. (:issue:`2743`)
+* Support multiple event listener plugins. They can be specified with ``event-listener.config-files`` configuration property. (:issue:`3128`)
+* Add ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` syntax to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add ``optimizer.push-partial-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle for pushing partial
+  aggregation through inner join. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Rename ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-join`` feature toggle to
+  ``optimizer.push-aggregation-through-outer-join``. (:issue:`3205`)
+* Expose operator stats of how many splits were processed with dynamic filter applied. (:issue:`3217`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Verify access to table columns when running ``SHOW STATS``. (:issue:`2665`)
+* Return only accessible to user views from ``<catalog>.information_schema.views`` table. (:issue:`3290`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix failure reading certain Parquet files larger than 2GB. (:issue:`2730`)
+* Improve performance when reading gzip-compressed Parquet data. (:issue:`3175`)
+* Add ``hive.fs.new-directory-permissions`` configuration property for setting the permissions of new directories
+  created by Presto. Default value is ``0777``. (:issue:`3126`)
+* Add ``hive.partition-use-column-names`` configuration property and matching ``partition_use_column_names`` catalog
+  session property that allows to match columns between table and partition schemas by names. By default they are mapped
+  by index. (:issue:2933`)
+* Add support for ``CREATE SCHEMA ... AUTHORIZATION`` to create a schema with specified owner. (:issue:`3066`).
+* Add support for endpoint URL for Glue. (:issue:`3239`)
+* Add experimental file system caching. This can be enabled with the ``hive.cache.enabled`` catalog property. (:issue:`2679`)
+
+BigQuery Connector Changes
+--------------------------
+
+* Extract parent project ID from service account before looking at the environment. (:issue:`3131`)
+
+MongoDB Connector Changes
+-------------------------
+
+* Add ``objectid_timestamp`` function for getting ``timestamp with time zone`` from ``ObjectId``. (:issue:`3089`)
+* Delete document from ``_schema`` collection when DROP TABLE is executed for the table that exists only in ``_schema``. (:issue:`3234`)
+
+Kudu Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix incorrect column mapping in Kudu connector (:issue:`3170`, :issue:`2963`)
+* Fix incorrect query result for certain queries involving ``IS NULL`` predicates with ``OR``. (:issue:`3274`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Add support for ``ip`` type. (:issue:`3347`)
+* Add support for `keyword` fields with numeric values. (:issue:`3381`)
+
+Memory Connector Changes
+------------------------
+
+* List missing views in ``system.jdbc.tables`` table. (:issue:`3208`)
+
+SQL Server Connector
+--------------------
+
+* Reject ``ALTER TABLE ... RENAME TO`` between schemas. Previously such rename was accepted but
+  renamed was accepted but performed incorrectly. (:issue:`3284`)
+
+SPI Changes
+-----------
+
+* Expose row filters and column masks in ``QueryCompletedEvent``. (:issue:`3183`)
+* Expose referenced functions and procedures in ``QueryCompletedEvent``. (:issue:`3246`)
+* Allow ``Connector`` to provide ``EventListener`` registration. (:issue:`3166`)

nodes.bodyText:
* Deprecate the ``ConnectorPageSourceProvider.createPageSource()` variant without the
  ``dynamicFilter`` parameter. The method will be removed in a future release. (:issue:`3255`)
